title: Ecological Dynamics-Based Learning for Athlete Training Design

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental exercise biomechanics and comprehension of data analysis concepts
context.additional_context: Real-time feedback using digital devices combined with offline hands-on practice

learning_goals: Learners can identify at least three key constraints affecting kicking performance by analyzing real-game environment data.
Learners can design representative training scenarios by applying ecological dynamics theory.
Learners can explain differences in constraint interactions across skill levels using rule-based analysis via the Apriori algorithm.

resources: Australian Rules Football Game Video Materials

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
